text: ve log kamazor samajhe gae the bade bananevaalon se kahenge, "nahin, balki raat-din kee makkaaree thee jab tum hamase kahate the ki ham allaah ke saath kufr karen aur doosaron ko usaka samakaksh thaharaen." jab ve yaatana dekhenge to man hee man pachhataenge aur ham un logon kee garadanon mein jinhonne kufr kee neeti apanaee, tauq daal denge. ve vahee to badale mein paenge, jo ve karate rahe the
